woohoo..i got 4O's and a F for mid yr...hurray!!haha..guess wad, cmi queen lost her voice, can go irritate her liao..haha..think i forgot to blog the past two days..was kinda busy wif my stuff..planning to watch some movie or go bowling nxt wk, takers anyone?

ahh...oral exam finally over man..u wun believe what happened yesterday. freaked out and duno how to read soooo many words lor..and den came the conversation..really die man..the teacher say did didnt even noe wad i was saying lor! so liao..den i tried explaining what duties a class rep has to do and ended up toking crap..so pai sei..when i leaving that time, i saw the teachers laughing lor..so die-ded sia..
die-ded sia..my pw so behind time...argh..now printing 60+ copies of our survey questions..did-ded sia..liao man..Later got chinese oral..sure sia suay man..really die liao..man..gtg now..cherrios =)

saw these nice pics..tot u guys mite wan to c..

wow man..gues wad, my mum told me my shorts MIA sia..go into wash but nvr came out...wow..creepy sia..haha..hmm..mayb the washin machine got portal to another dimension man..must check it out..either that or the shorts shrank until bo liao..wahaha..lame sia..cant believe tis type of thing can happen..wah sian..today got back math result..so pissed..failed by half mark..and the stupid markers can give me 0 mark otho i got 3 ticks..so CMI..wah sian lor..everything either minus half or 1/4 but duno how to giv mark..so kiam..man..hopefully final yr do better.. cant believe change math cher..he better b better (pun unintended) den ashokan..wah..how..think i gtg now..got GP..mayb that oso fail..wahahahahaha..kana retain man..mayb i'll go poly afterall..

wah sian..hav 2 start mah 1st blog wif lots of crap..gues mwad man, i FLUNKED chem!! waaaaaa...so sad sia..broke mi heart..cant believe it man..was depressed since yesterday..man..sux lor..mayb shld start pia-ing again..now hav 2 wait 4 the rest of my results (obviously sux) to come out nxt wk..cant wait to c my phy results man..haha..mayb can get single digit n break sch record..gosh..i'm broke sia..went out movie-ing and pool-bowling last sun..blow big buckz man..oh yeah, guess wad, CMI today so sad coz she got F 4 phy..mad lor..i think she realli CMI, liddat oso get depressed.. sian..duno wad to do now..mayb shld start training from nxt wk 4 my NAFA..sure fail 4 pull up man..haha..butt too lazy to wake up..haha..ooh..juz saw blur queen and cheryl..wad dey doin man??
